Sharing the same stats as the rune full helm with a +1 prayer bonus, the Saradomin full helm also looks visually similar. Advanced data
Item ID2665

The Saradomin full helm is a decorated rune full helm that is affiliated with the god Saradomin. Sharing the same stats as the rune full helm with a +1 prayer bonus, the Saradomin full helm also looks visually similar. Its appearance differs in that the helm features an ornamental white trim around the symbol of Saradomin. The full helm requires 40 Defence to wear and cannot be made using the Smithing skill. Players can obtain a Saradomin full helm as a reward from completing hard Treasure Trails.

Wearing any piece of this armour set will cause followers of Saradomin to become unaggressive upon entering the God Wars Dungeon.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-6-3
 Defence bonuses
+30+32+27-1+30
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+1List

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The helmet's ranged attack bonus has been decreased from -2 to -3.

12 June 2014
(update)

The item was renamed from "Saradomin full" to "Saradomin full helm".

27 March 2014
(update | poll)

The god helmets now gives a +1 Prayer bonus.

[[File:Saradomin full helm detail.png|left|120px]]
[[File:Saradomin full helm chathead.png|left]]
The '''Saradomin full helm''' is a decorated [[rune full helm]] that is affiliated with the god [[Saradomin]]. Sharing the same stats as the rune full helm with a +1 [[prayer bonus]], the Saradomin full helm also looks visually similar. Its appearance differs in that the helm features an ornamental white trim around the symbol of Saradomin. The full helm requires 40 [[Defence]] to wear and '''cannot''' be made using the [[Smithing]] skill. Players can obtain a Saradomin full helm as a reward from completing [[Clue scroll (hard)|hard]] [[Treasure Trails]].

Wearing any piece of this armour set will cause [[God Wars Dungeon#Saradomin|followers of Saradomin]] to become unaggressive upon entering the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
